name: Unblooded Nokia 3310
description:
Wanted to get much more done. :T

Also, messed up with auto-anti-aliasing  and can't upload a fix

Art by Tyler Corbett (@VoxCorvi)

Note: Keyboard controls are made to match the button layout of the old cell phone.

[LEFT CONTROLS]

  • Start / Pause: C
  • Movement: WESD
  • Front Slash: Q
  • Back Stab: A
  • Cancel = Z
  • Nothing = X

[RIGHT CONTROLS (Numpad Only)]

  • Start / Pause: period (.)
  • Movement: 5623
  • Front Slash: 1
  • Back Stab: 4
  • Cancel = Asterisk (*)
  • Nothing = 0
